summary: The document is a confidential memorandum dated 17 November 1961, addressed to the Chief of the WH Division, confirming the cancellation of certain facilities as previously requested in a memorandum dated 19 October 1961. It is signed by the Deputy Director of Security (Investigations and Support) and is marked 'SECRET'. This document is part of the records related to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
key_findings: The document is part of the records related to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It confirms the cancellation of several facilities as requested in a previous memorandum.
The document is marked 'SECRET', indicating its confidential nature at the time of creation.
